Pakleni decembar za Liverpul: Dva dana, dva meča, dva tima u samo 24 sata
Jirgen Klop se pomirio sa odlukom Fudbalske lige

05 Nov 2019

Engleska fudbalska liga potvrdila je termin četvrtfinalnog duela Liga kupa između Aston Vile i Liverpula za utorak 17. decembar u 20.45 časova kako je prvobitno i bilo planirano. Odluka je usledila uprkos činjenici da Crvene samo dan kasnije očekuje učešće na Svetskom klupskom prvenstvu u Kataru gde je polufinale zakazano za sredu.
Trener Liverpula Jirgen Klop je posle trijumfa na penale nad Arsenalom u prethodnoj rundi čak zapretio i da će se tim povući iz  Liga kupa ukoliko im se raspored ne prilagodi. Iz EFL su pokazali volju da izmeste utakmicu u neki od termina dva polufinala, ali se od toga odustalo."Prioritet Fudbalske lige je da zadrži integritet Karabao kupa, a odluka koju smo doneli treba da očuva najvažnije interese takmčenja koje privlači milione gledalaca u zemlji i nostranstvu i koje se prenosi u 130 zemalja širom sveta", kažu iz Fudbalske lige.  
U Liverpulu su se pomirili s odlukom i nameravaju da izvedu dva različita tima."Nije to idealan scenario, ali je dogovor postignut u najboljem interesu takmičenja, klubova i nas samih", kažu na Enfildu.
Tako ćemo 17. decembra na Vila Parku verovatno gledati Brustera, Kelehera, Vilijamsa, Van den Berga i ostalu mlađariju iz omladinskog tima Crvenih, pošto će Salah, Mane, Firmino, Origi, Keita i ostali dan ranije biti u Kataru gde će juriti svetsku krunu.
Foto: Reuters

Hell's December for Liverpool: Two days, two matches, two teams in just 24 hours
Jirgen Klop has come to terms with the decision of the Football League

05 Nov 2019

The English Football League has confirmed the term of the quarterfinal duel of the League Cup between Aston Villa and Liverpool on Tuesday 17 December at 20.45 as originally planned. The decision came despite the fact that the Reds are only expected to participate in the Qatar World Club Championship a day later where the semi-finals are scheduled for Wednesday.
Liverpool coach Jirgen Klop even after the triumph on penalties over Arsenal in the previous round, even threatened that the team will withdraw from the League Cup if their schedule is not adjusted. The EFL have shown a willingness to move the game to one of the two semi-finals, but they have given up. "The priority of the Football League is to maintain the integrity of the Carabao Cup, and the decision we made should preserve the most important competition interests that attract millions of spectators in the country and which is being broadcast in 130 countries around the world, "the Football League said.
In Liverpool, they have come to terms with the decision and intend to take on two different teams. "It's not an ideal scenario, but an agreement has been reached in the best interests of the competition, the clubs and ourselves," they say at Enfield.
So on December 17 at Vila Park we will probably watch Bruster, Keller, Williams, Van den Berg and the rest of the Reds youth team, since Salah, Mane, Firmino, Origi, Keita and the rest of the day will be in Qatar where they will be racing the world crown .
